Source.Name: modemmanager-qt
Source.Summary: Qt wrapper for ModemManager DBus API
Source.Description: ModemManagerQt provides access to all ModemManager features exposed on DBus. It allows you to manage modem devices and access to information available for your modem devices, like signal, location and messages.

Package.Name: modemmanager-qt

Package.Description: ModemManagerQt provides access to all ModemManager features exposed on DBus. It allows you to manage modem devices and access to information available for your modem devices, like signal, location and messages.
